meta.title: Battery Technology & Systems | Citypack
meta.description: Advanced LiFePO₄ battery systems for events and rentals. Safe, reliable, professional-grade power solutions.

hero.title: Professional Battery Systems for Events and Rentals
hero.description: Advanced LiFePO₄ battery technology with multi-circuit outputs, real-time monitoring, and safety-first design. Built for professional use.

items.title: LiFePO₄ Chemistry for Safety
items.description: Lithium iron phosphate (LFP) instead of NMC for thermal stability in public deployments. Long cycle life (3000+ cycles) and no documented thermal runaway cases.

items.title: Multi-Circuit Design
items.description: Three independent 20A outlets plus 60A Bates connector. One vendor cannot knock out another vendor's power. Professional distro compatibility without adapters.

items.title: Scalable Capacity
items.description: 3 kW portable units for field crews. Mid-capacity units for markets and park rentals. High-capacity units and trailers for large festivals and multi-day events.

items.title: Real-Time Telemetry
items.description: [PLACEHOLDER: Live dashboard showing every battery's state of charge, temperature, location, and load profile. Automated alerts for overheating, low charge before events, geofence violations, or abnormal usage patterns.]

items.title: Proactive Maintenance
items.description: [PLACEHOLDER: Cell-level health monitoring flags weak batteries before they fail in the field. Maintenance workflows schedule refurbishments. Predictive analytics optimize charging cycles and extend fleet life.]

items.title: Safety & Compliance
items.description: Over-current and over-temperature protection at cell level. GPS tracking and geofencing to mitigate theft. Remote shutoff capability for safety incidents. UL-listed components and LFP chemistry meet California public safety standards.

items.title: Impact Reporting
items.description: [PLACEHOLDER: Automated reporting for CPA grants and city climate plans. Export kWh delivered, generator-hours avoided, estimated tCO₂ reductions, vendor participation rates. CSV, dashboard, and PDF formats for staff and Council presentations.]
